TopicTitle: My failed attempt at a rocket car

Articles.Content:
I got bored so I decided to build a car... of sorts.... I used the stock parts and this sort of happened.

KSP: Failed attempt at a rocket car I was using fraps to record it.

I\'ve tried a rocket car once.

I had to use a single engine and had to use RCSs to knock the rocket over (this was before spaceplanes), and the result was a very driveable car.

until it hit a bump, then it\'d blow.
Ever since the space planes came out it gave us so many new options. ;D

That\'s waaaaay better than any of my rocket cars! ;P

At least the Kerbonauts are alive.
You should turn it 180 degrees in the assembly building. Then it will go the other way, gives you more space to drive (until you hit some bumps).
Elsby Kerman was epic in this video! Not better than Jeb, but still really hardcore/epic! 8)

Elsby Kerman was epic in this video! Not better than Jeb, but still really hardcore/epic! 8)

Jeb was somewhere else at the time.... At the time, Jeb was orbiting the sun on his one man mission.
Oh, I see your problem, it needs more boosters!
